member.name: T:Pathfinder.Util.ConvertAny
member.summary: Extended conversion utilities to convert any type to any other type provided the conversion is valid.

member.name: M:Pathfinder.Util.ConvertAny.#cctor
member.summary: Initializes static members of the class.

member.name: M:Pathfinder.Util.ConvertAny.CanConvert``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether this instance can convert the specified value.
member.returns: true if this instance can convert the specified from value; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Pathfinder.Util.ConvertAny.CanConvert(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether this instance can convert the specified to the .
member.returns: true if the conversion is valid; otherwise, false.
member.remarks:
This method checks 4 types of conversions:
1. If they are the same type, returns true. 2. If they are both IConvertible types, return true. 3. If the toType is part of the inheritance chain of fromType. 4. Direct casting, only returns true if both types have default constructors.

member.name: M:Pathfinder.Util.ConvertAny.TryConvert``1(System.Object,``0@)
member.summary: Attempts to convert the value to the specified type.
member.returns: true if conversion succeeds, false otherwise.
member.remarks: If the conversion fails, the value of is the default of that particular type.

member.name: M:Pathfinder.Util.ConvertAny.Convert``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts the specified from value.
member.returns: Converted value.
member.exception: Raised when the value cannot be converted to the specified type.

member.name: M:Pathfinder.Util.ConvertAny.ConvertByType(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Converts value to the specified type.
member.returns: Object that represents the converted type.

member.name: M:Pathfinder.Util.ConvertAny.Default``1
member.summary: Creates a default instance of
member.typeparam: Type to create a default instance of.
member.returns: Default instance of .
member.remarks: For primitive types this will create a value of 0 with the specified type. For objects, if the object has a default constructor it will return a default instance of the type. If the object does not have a default constructor, it will return null.

member.name: M:Pathfinder.Util.ConvertAny.DefaultByType(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a default instance of .
member.returns: Instance of the specified type.
member.remarks: This method uses the generic method to create an instance of the type.
